name: The Legend of Progress
description:
UPDATED FOR DEMO DAY 7

In a world of stagnation, progress has the power to grant any wish. Will you use yours to rescue the princess?

Controls:

  • Z,X,C: Use equipment
  • Arrow keys: move
  • Enter: Pause/inventory screen.
  • (in inventory) Z,X,C : Reorganize equipment
  • (in inventory) pg up/pg down: view different floors of a dungeon
  • F4: Change window size
